bug.author: drlebedev
bug.summary: Deeplearning4j UI does not respect custom port property
bug.description:
Deeplearning4j UI in version 0.8.0 does not respect org.deeplearning4j.ui.port System property set. <denchmark-code> String portProperty = System.getProperty(UI_SERVER_PORT_PROPERTY); </denchmark-code>
portProperty that is read in PlayUIServer is not used.
